scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,web "npm run dev -w apps/server" "npm run dev -w apps/web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/server && npm run build -w apps/web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w apps/server && npm run typecheck -w apps/web
scripts.test: npm run test -w apps/server && npm run test -- --run -w apps/web
